TaskDescription: Participants were required to step in time to an auditory tone sequenceand adapt their step length and rate to occasional shifts in tempo of the pacing stimulus (i.e., following shifts to a faster or slower tempo)
InstitutionAddress: Institute of Neural Engineering, Stremayrgasse 16/IV, 8010 Graz, Austria
SubjectArtefactDescription: this is a MOBI dataset recorded during walking, thus movement and EMG artefacts are to be expected
